essences.name: Essence of Charcoal
essences.effect: When this Memory hits an enemy, it fires a charcoal shard, dealing 60% damage. If the target is already burning, it deals 100% Fire damage instead.

essences.name: Essence of Confidence
essences.effect: Damage dealt by this Memory to nearby enemies is increased by 40%.

essences.name: Essence of Efficiency
essences.effect: This Memory gains 36 Memory Haste, reducing its cooldown by 26%.

essences.name: Essence of Guidance
essences.effect: This Memory's healing is increased by 40%. 30% of the excess healing from this Memory is converted into a Barrier that lasts for 2 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Lethality
essences.effect: This Memory's damage against enemies with 70% or more Health is increased by 60%.

essences.name: Essence of Love
essences.effect: When this Memory restores Health or grants a Barrier to an ally, their Movement Speed and Attack Speed increase by 16% for 2 seconds.The effect is reduced by 50% when applied to yourself.

essences.name: Essence of Quicksilver
essences.effect: Casting this Memory or dealing Fire damage with it increases Movement Speed by 30%, gradually returning to normal over 2.5 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Regeneration
essences.effect: If this Memory is cast in combat, it restores your Health by 41 over 7 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Responsibility
essences.effect: Every 10 seconds, this Memory's cast is empowered. 1.2 seconds after the empowered cast, it deals 400% damage divided among all enemies hit by that cast.

essences.name: Essence of Sharpness
essences.effect: Casting this Memory fires 5 arrows that deal 90% damage to random enemies.

essences.name: Essence of Shatter
essences.effect: Every 10 seconds, the cast of this Memory is empowered. Damage dealt to enemies by the empowered cast is increased by 40%. If it deals Light damage, it is increased by 72% instead.

essences.name: Essence of Sulfur
essences.effect: All damage dealt by this Memory is increased by 15% and converted to Fire damage. Your Fire damage over time is increased by 50%.

essences.name: Essence of Talc
essences.effect: Every 10 seconds, the cast of this Memory is empowered. The initial damage dealt to each enemy by the empowered cast is increased by 400%.

essences.name: Essence of Vengeance
essences.effect: When you take any damage, fire 2 blades that deal 102% damage to nearby enemies. After taking damage, this Memory's damage and healing are increased by 34% for 5 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of the Void
essences.effect: After casting this Memory, your next attack within 4 seconds explodes, dealing 150% Dark Damage to the target and nearby enemies.

essences.name: Essence of Wind
essences.effect: Casting this Memory increases Attack Speed by 33% for 5 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Aftershock
essences.effect:
Casting this Memory releases a delayed shockwave that deals 200% Cold damage to enemies around you and stuns them for 0.5 seconds.
For each enemy hit by this shockwave, you gain 4 Armor, up to a maximum of 22 Armor. When hitting a boss, you gain the maximum Armor. This Armor lasts until you cast this Memory again.

essences.name: Essence of Blossoming
essences.effect: This Memory deals 70% less damage to enemies. When it deals damage, it heals a random nearby ally for 22% of the damage dealt.

essences.name: Essence of Clemency
essences.effect: Restore your Health for 4% of the damage dealt by this Memory.

essences.name: Essence of Crimson
essences.effect:
Every 4th Basic Attack becomes empowered, triggering a Crimson Explosion that deals 100% Dark Damage to enemies. The explosion radius scales with your Critical Strike Chance.
You restore 22% Health for each enemy hit by the explosion, increased by 100% if the target is a Boss.

essences.name: Essence of Direness
essences.effect: The lower your Health, the shorter the cooldown of this Memory. When your Health is at 30%, the cooldown is reduced by up to 55%.

essences.name: Essence of Domination
essences.effect: Increases Critical Strike Chance by 20%. Each time you land a critical strike on an enemy, your Critical Strike Damage increases by 0.3%, stacking up to 20%.

essences.name: Essence of Fangs
essences.effect: Every 4th basic attack is a critical strike. When you land a critical strike, this Memory's cooldown is reduced by 0.7 seconds and launches 2 Fangs at nearby enemies, each dealing 60% damage.

essences.name: Essence of Fever
essences.effect: When this Memory deals Fire damage to an enemy, it infects them with Fever. Enemies infected with Fever explode after 2 seconds, dealing 130% Fire damage to themselves and nearby enemies. For each Fire stack on the target, the explosion radius increases by 30% and explosion damage increases by 10%.

essences.name: Essence of Flexibility
essences.effect: While this Memory is on cooldown, 37% of damage taken is split over 4 seconds. This split damage is reduced by 20%.

essences.name: Essence of Insensitivity
essences.effect: Casting this Memory drops a bomb for every 2m you travel over the next 3 seconds. Each bomb explodes after a brief delay, dealing 140% Fire damage to enemies.

essences.name: Essence of Insight
essences.effect: When this Memory deals any damage to an enemy, it deals an additional 200% Light damage to up to 3 enemies and increases Memory Haste by 20 for 5 seconds. Can only trigger once every 3 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Inversion
essences.effect: This Memory's cooldown increases by 15%, but it also deals 20% more damage to enemies. Its elemental damage is inverted (Fire/Cold, Light/Dark).

essences.name: Essence of Metal
essences.effect: When you kill an enemy, the cooldown of this Memory is reduced by 1 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of the Giant
essences.effect: Increases Maximum Health by 260. This Memory's damage increases by 1% for every 50 points of your Maximum Health.

essences.name: Essence of Obsidian
essences.effect: Casting this Memory empowers your next attack within 5 seconds. The empowered attack deals 250% Dark Damage to the target and reduces this Memory's cooldown by 1 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Finality
essences.effect: While this Memory is not on cooldown, gain stacks of Finality every second up to 20 stacks. When stacks are present, this Memory's cast is empowered, increasing damage by 5% per stack.

essences.name: Essence of Opportunity
essences.effect: Casting this Memory reduces the cooldown of your Dodge by 3 seconds. Can only trigger once every 8 seconds.

essences.name: Our Story (Completed!)
essences.effect: Increases Attack Damage and Ability Power by 0, and the effects of all buffs from Distorting Rush by 0.

essences.name: Our Story (Work in Progress)
essences.effect: Quality increases by 50% every time you defeat 75 enemies. It becomes completed when quality reaches 500%.

essences.name: Essence of Overload
essences.effect: When you cast this Memory, sacrifice 20% of your current Health to empower the cast. The damage and healing dealt by the empowered cast are increased by 45%.

essences.name: Essence of Pain
essences.effect: All damage dealt by this Memory deals 40% Area damage around the target. This Area damage shares the elemental type with the original damage.

essences.name: Essence of Predation
essences.effect: This Memory deals 60% increased damage to Bosses and Hunters. Defeating a Hunter drops 1 Orbs of Power, while defeating a Boss drops 3. When you collect an Orb of Power, either Attack Damage or Ability Power permanently increases by 1 at random.

essences.name: Essence of Protection
essences.effect: Casting this Memory grants 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken and making you Unstoppable. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Reflex
essences.effect: When you take any damage, unleash cold toward the nearest enemy, dealing 120% Cold Damage and knocking them back, then increase your Armor by 40 for 1.5 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Thunder
essences.effect: Casting another Memory or using Dodge grants 1 Thunder stack, up to 7 times. Casting this Memory consumes all Thunder stacks, calling down lightning on nearby enemies once for each stack. Each lightning deals 117% Light damage.

essences.name: Essence of Twilight
essences.effect: Your basic attacks are converted to Dark damage. When this Memory deals damage to an enemy with 3 or more Dark stacks, consumes all stacks to deal 54% damage per stack and heal for 6 per stack.

essences.name: Essence of Umbra
essences.effect: This memory's damage is increased by 42% of your Critical Strike Chance. If the Damage is Dark Damage, Restore 6% of the damage dealt as Health.

essences.name: Essence of Virtue
essences.effect: The number of charges for this Memory increases by 1. Each 150% increase in quality raises the number of charges by 1.

essences.name: Camilla's Gift
essences.effect: Can be sold at the shop for 0 Gold. The price increases by 0 each time you move to a next world. It breaks if your Health drops below 50% from enemy damage.

essences.name: Apple of Discord
essences.effect: Each time you move through a Rift, this Memory is temporarily transformed into a different random Memory. The transformed Memory has no cooldown, but can only be cast 4 times per room, and returns to the original Memory when all casts are used.

essences.name: Divine Faith
essences.effect: Each time you kill an enemy with this Memory, gain a stack of Faith up to 75 stacks. For each stack of Faith, this Memory's damage to enemies and healing to allies increases by 0.5%, and your Maximum Health increases by 4.

essences.name: Embertail
essences.effect: Your attacks ricochet to deal 100% Fire damage to a nearby enemy. For each nearby enemy engulfed in flames, this Memory's damage and healing are increased by 8% and its cooldown is reduced by 8%. Your Fire damage over time is increased by 100%.

essences.name: Heart of Gold
essences.effect: Casting this Memory consumes 3% of your Gold to empower the cast. Damage and healing from the empowered cast increase by 12% for every 100 Gold you have.

essences.name: Metallic Crystal
essences.effect: The parts exposed to light glow with surreal colors.

essences.name: Essence of Paranoia
essences.effect: When you take any damage, this Memory gains 150 Memory Haste for 6 seconds, reducing its cooldown by 60%, but it is automatically cast on nearby enemies.

essences.name: Perfection
essences.effect: Increases Attack Damage by 7, Ability Power by 7, Maximum Health by 35, Attack Speed by 10%, Critical Strike Chance by 6%, and Memory Haste by 10.

essences.name: Pure White
essences.effect: Every 10 seconds, the cast of this Memory is empowered. The empowered cast fires 3 projectiles, dealing Light damage equal to 20% of the initial damage dealt to each enemy. The number of shots increases by the number of Light stacks on each target.

essences.name: Eye of the Sun
essences.effect: Every 20 seconds, this Memory's cast is empowered, raining Solar Light on all nearby enemies who are burning. Solar Light deals 360% Fire damage over 1.5 seconds and increases Burn stacks by 9. Increases your Fire damage over time by 100%.

essences.name: Suppressed Arcanum
essences.effect: Casting this Memory sacrifices 5% of your current Health to create a Golden Explosion. Enemies caught in the explosion take 240% Light damage, while allies receive a Barrier of 61% that lasts 2.5 seconds. If your Health is below 60%, the Barrier amount of this Memory increases by 50%.

essences.name: Essence of the Abyss
essences.effect: Converts all Damage dealt by this memory to Dark Damage. If the target hit by this memory has 3 or more stacks of Darkness, triggers Attack Effects with a 43% chance.

essences.name: Essence of Accuracy
essences.effect: When this Memory deals damage to a distant enemy, it fires an additional projectile that deals 50% damage. The damage dealt by the projectile shares the elemental type with the original damage.

essences.name: Essence of Adventure
essences.effect: Whenever you move to a new place, increase the quality of another Essence equipped to this Memory by +10% and gain 19 Gold.

essences.name: Essence of the Blade
essences.effect: Each time this Memory hits an enemy, it summons blades that lacerate the target for 58% damage 3 times. Can only trigger once every 2 seconds for each enemy.

essences.name: Essence of Bleakness
essences.effect: This Memory deals 50% increased damage to enemies affected by Cold, slow, root, or stun.

essences.name: Essence of Blood Drops
essences.effect: When Health falls below 40%, sacrifice the quality of this Essence by 80% to restore 40% of your Maximum Health. Can only trigger once every 4 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of the Celestial
essences.effect: Every 10 seconds, this Memory's cast is empowered. When the empowered cast hits an enemy for the first time, it drops 4 meteors that deal 130% Light damage each.

essences.name: Essence of Composure
essences.effect: Casting this Memory increases your Critical Strike Chance by 30% for 5 seconds. This effect ends early if you take damage from enemies.

essences.name: Essence of Contempt
essences.effect: This Memory deals more damage as the target's Health decreases, up to a 50% increase when their Health is at 20%.

essences.name: Essence of Dusk
essences.effect: Casting this Memory fires 2 Dusk shards that deal 30% Dark damage each time you attack an enemy for 5 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Flow
essences.effect: Dealing Light damage with any Memory reduces this Memory's cooldown by 6%. For Ultimate abilities, only 40% of the effect is applied. The Cooldown Reduction effect for this Memory also applies to equipped Essences.

essences.name: Essence of Frost
essences.effect: When this Memory deals Cold damage, it deals Cold damage equal to 10% of your Maximum Health and briefly stuns enemies. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds per enemy. Each time this triggers, permanently increase your Maximum Health by 1.

essences.name: Essence of Freezing
essences.effect: Casting this Memory releases a burst of cold that deals 160% Cold damage to enemies. The area of effect increases with quality.

essences.name: Essence of Voracity
essences.effect: For 5 seconds after casting this Memory, Attack Damage is increased by 15% and restore 6 Health per attack.

essences.name: Essence of Momentum
essences.effect: Each time you attack an enemy, the cooldown of this Memory is reduced by 0.4 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of the Starry Sky
essences.effect: Each time this Memory hits an enemy, your Attack Speed increases by 10% for 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 20%. If it deals Dark damage, it can increase up to a maximum of 40%. Attacking the enemy refreshes the duration of this effect.

essences.name: Essence of Panic
essences.effect: Taking any damage grants this Memory 30 Memory Haste and your Movement Speed increases by 20% for 3 seconds.

essences.name: Essence of Rejuvenation
essences.effect: Every 15 seconds, this Memory's cast becomes empowered. For 1.5 seconds after casting the empowered cast, restore 14% of the damage dealt as your Health.

essences.name: Essence of Ricochet
essences.effect: The damage or healing from this Memory has a 50% chance to ricochet to another nearby target, dealing 90% damage or healing. If it's damage, it shares the elemental type with the original damage.

essences.name: Essence of Rigidity
essences.effect: When this Memory hits an enemy, gain a Barrier of 9 that lasts for 2 seconds. If it deals Cold damage, this effect is increased by 80%.

essences.name: Essence of Scorch
essences.effect: Casting this Memory fires 3 Fireballs, each dealing 47% Fire damage to nearby enemies.

essences.name: Essence of Shock
essences.effect: Every 4th basic attack becomes empowered, unleashing Lightning that bounces between enemies, dealing 40% Light damage up to 2 times. For every 20% Critical Strike Chance, the maximum number of hits increases by 1.

essences.name: Essence of Snow
essences.effect: Gain a Barrier of 40 that recharges if you avoid damage for 5 seconds. While the Barrier is active, periodically launch a snowball at a random nearby enemy, dealing 80% Cold damage. The larger your Barrier, the quicker it fires.

essences.name: Essence of the Vortex
essences.effect: Periodically fires a Fireball at a random nearby enemy, dealing 90% Fire damage. The higher the quality, the quicker it fires.

essences.name: Essence of Stillness
essences.effect: Every 5 seconds, this memory's Cast becomes Enhanced. Upon Enhanced Cast, emit light that deals 200% Light Damage to enemies and Stuns them for 2 seconds. Higher quality increases the emission radius.

essences.name: Essence of Wealth
essences.effect: When an enemy damaged by this Memory is killed within 2 seconds, they drop 1.7 Gold. Gold is shared among all Travelers.

essences.name: Essence of the Wound
essences.effect: When this Memory deals damage to an enemy, it applies a Mark. Each attack on the Mark deals 44% damage, and after 3 attacks, the Mark explodes, dealing 275% damage to all nearby enemies.

essences.name: Eternal Flame
essences.effect:
Dealing Fire damage to an enemy with this Memory inflicts the Eternal Flame curse for 5 seconds. While under Eternal Flame, any damage you deal applies 1 Burn stack to the target.
All damage from this Memory is increased by 2.0% for each Burn stack on that enemy.

essences.name: Glacial Core
essences.effect:
Every 5 seconds, dealing damage with this Memory restores 3.6% of your Maximum Health. If it is Cold damage, the effect increases by 100%.
272% of all Health restored is converted into Cold damage, firing ice shards at nearby enemies.

essences.name: Last Starlight
essences.effect:
Every 15 seconds, this Memory's Cast is Empowered. On an Empowered Cast, create a black hole at the cast location that deals 160% Light Damage per second for 5 seconds. 
If this is not a location-targeted Memory, the black hole is created on the nearest enemy in the direction you are facing.

essences.name: Soul Prison
essences.effect: When you take Fatal damage, you ignore that damage and become Invulnerable for 3 seconds, then destroy this Essence. For every 1% of this Essence's quality, you restore 3 Health, and any excess healing is converted into a Barrier.
